<div id="womacContainer"></div>



<script>
    function generateWOMACTable() {
    const options = ["NONE", "SLIGHT", "MODERATE", "SEVERE", "EXTREME"];

    const womacSections = {
        "Pain": [
        "Walking on a flat surface",
        "Going up or down stairs",
        "At night while in bed",
        "Sitting or lying",
        "Standing upright"
        ],
        "Stiffness": [
        "After first waking in the morning",
        "Later in the day"
        ],
        "Difficulty": [
        "Descending stairs",
        "Ascending stairs",
        "Rising from sitting",
        "Standing",
        "Bending to floor",
        "Walking on flat",
        "Getting in/out of car",
        "Going shopping",
        "Putting on socks/stockings",
        "Rising from bed",
        "Taking off socks/stockings",
        "Lying in bed",
        "Getting in/out of bath",
        "Sitting",
        "Getting on/off toilet",
        "Heavy domestic duties",
        "Light domestic duties"
        ]
    };

    const table = document.createElement("table");
    table.style.width = "100%";
    table.style.borderCollapse = "collapse";
    table.style.textAlign = "center";
    table.style.border = "1px solid #ccc";
    table.style.marginBottom = "1em";
    table.style.fontFamily = "sans-serif";

    // Header
    const headerRow = document.createElement("tr");
    const questionHeader = document.createElement("th");
    questionHeader.textContent = "Question";
    questionHeader.style.padding = "8px";
    headerRow.appendChild(questionHeader);

    options.forEach(opt => {
        const th = document.createElement("th");
        th.textContent = opt;
        th.style.padding = "8px";
        th.style.backgroundColor = "#f8f8f8";
        headerRow.appendChild(th);
    });

    table.appendChild(headerRow);

    // Build rows
    for (const [sectionName, questions] of Object.entries(womacSections)) {
        const sectionRow = document.createElement("tr");
        const sectionCell = document.createElement("td");
        sectionCell.textContent = sectionName.toUpperCase();
        sectionCell.colSpan = options.length + 1;
        sectionCell.style.fontWeight = "bold";
        sectionCell.style.backgroundColor = "#e6e6e6";
        sectionCell.style.textAlign = "left";
        sectionCell.style.padding = "8px";
        sectionRow.appendChild(sectionCell);
        table.appendChild(sectionRow);

        questions.forEach(question => {
        const row = document.createElement("tr");

        const questionCell = document.createElement("td");
        questionCell.textContent = question;
        questionCell.style.textAlign = "left";
        questionCell.style.padding = "4px 8px";
        row.appendChild(questionCell);

        options.forEach((opt, i) => {
            const cell = document.createElement("td");

            const button = document.createElement("button");
            button.textContent = opt;
            button.dataset.section = sectionName;
            button.dataset.question = question;
            button.dataset.value = i;
            button.style.width = "100%";
            button.style.padding = "8px";
            button.style.border = "1px solid #ccc";
            button.style.borderRadius = "4px";
            button.style.cursor = "pointer";
            button.style.backgroundColor = "white";

            // Button click behavior
            button.addEventListener("click", () => {
            // Unselect other buttons in the same row
            const siblings = cell.parentElement.querySelectorAll("button");
            siblings.forEach(b => (b.style.backgroundColor = "white"));

            // Highlight this one
            button.style.backgroundColor = "#007bff";
            button.style.color = "white";

            // Store selected value for this question
            button.parentElement.dataset.selected = i;
            });

            cell.appendChild(button);
            row.appendChild(cell);
        });

        table.appendChild(row);
        });
    }

    return table;
    }

    // ✅ Scoring function
    function calculateWOMACScores() {
    const sections = ["Pain", "Stiffness", "Difficulty"];
    const scores = { Pain: 0, Stiffness: 0, Difficulty: 0, Total: 0 };

    sections.forEach(section => {
        // Get all rows for that section
        const rows = document.querySelectorAll(`tr:has(button[data-section='${section}'])`);
        rows.forEach(row => {
        const selectedVal = row.dataset.selected;
        if (selectedVal !== undefined) {
            const val = parseInt(selectedVal);
            scores[section] += val;
            scores.Total += val;
        }
        });
    });

    const maxValues = { Pain: 20, Stiffness: 8, Difficulty: 68, Total: 96 };
    const percentScores = Object.fromEntries(
        Object.entries(scores).map(([key, val]) => [key, ((val / maxValues[key]) * 100).toFixed(1) + "%"])
    );

    return { raw: scores, percent: percentScores };
    }

    // ✅ Attach to page
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    const container = document.getElementById("womacContainer");
    container.appendChild(generateWOMACTable());

    const button = document.createElement("button");
    button.textContent = "Calculate WOMAC Score";
    button.style.padding = "10px 16px";
    button.style.backgroundColor = "#28a745";
    button.style.color = "white";
    button.style.border = "none";
    button.style.borderRadius = "4px";
    button.style.cursor = "pointer";

    const resultDiv = document.createElement("div");
    resultDiv.style.marginTop = "16px";
    resultDiv.style.fontFamily = "monospace";

    button.onclick = () => {
        const { raw, percent } = calculateWOMACScores();
        resultDiv.innerHTML = `
        <strong>WOMAC Scores:</strong><br>
        Pain: ${raw.Pain} / 20 (${percent.Pain})<br>
        Stiffness: ${raw.Stiffness} / 8 (${percent.Stiffness})<br>
        Difficulty: ${raw.Difficulty} / 68 (${percent.Difficulty})<br>
        <br><strong>Total: ${raw.Total} / 96 (${percent.Total})</strong>
        `;
    };

    container.appendChild(button);
    container.appendChild(resultDiv);
    });

</script>
